channel.title: My First Item [Blender] [100% by me]
channel.description:
;D ;D ;D ;D ;D Yo Mopar I was looking through the forums yesterday and I saw this program in a topic called blender I was figuring out how to use this and so im still not perfect at it im not even 25% perfect at it yet and so this is soo basic and its my first ever item ive made ever! and if you can give me feedback(preferably good feedback) I will be happy :P :P here it is [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/DragonThrowingKnife.png[/img]Dragon Throwing Knife tell me what you think and please i need a tutorial on how to do some basics please and thanks
Plz gimme feedback :P

item.title: My First Item [Blender] [100% by me]
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:16, topic:375341”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=471297.msg3447565#msg3447565 date=1293528408]

Lol, fail quote (its ok), but Meta is the program alot of others on this forum use, including myself. They say it hold’s me back,but meh, I’m doing damn well, anyways, here is Meta.
http://www.metaseq.net/english/

This^ I find myself going back to meta because I have become so proficient at it.
[/quote]
And its not a pain on the eyes to look at lol.[/quote]
hey I downloaded meta its pretti good im making a Deco GreatSword based on the yellow Deco

Read full topic

item.title: My First Item [Blender] [100% by me]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

the wanderer:

Actually Blender’s 2.55 beta’s UI is quite nice. Just there’s no ruts for it… So I will probably wait til they get out of beta and learn how to use some of the tools meta either hasn’t developed alot or isn’t even added.

My eyesight in my right eye though is horrible, so I have an issue with how they setup things still.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Item [Blender] [100% by me]
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=471297.msg3447548#msg3447548 date=1293526568]

[quote=“✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:11, topic:375341”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=471297.msg3447536#msg3447536 date=1293525108]

Its alright, at least your trying to learn and blender isn’t the easiest thing to get use to. But really I can already tell its to much poly. But overall I guess 3/5.
[/quote]Wat’s Poly and do you know how to Free Draw on Blender?

Poly is just another word for faces. “Whats your total poly” is just the same as “Whats your face count”.

Uh Oh…

Dunno how to do that lawl? i mean like finding the face count[/quote]
Since I don’t know how to do that in Blender. I’ll tell you a way to check, until someone corrects this with a legit way.

Export your model as a 3DS, and then open the model in Meta. In meta, go to View > Document Information.
[/quote
good news and bad news the good news is I undrstood this part"Since I don’t know how to do that in Blender. I’ll tell you a way to check, until someone corrects this with a legit way.

"
bad news is I dont know wat meta is… sorry for being a big pain in the ass

Read full topic

item.title: My First Item [Blender] [100% by me]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:11, topic:375341”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=471297.msg3447536#msg3447536 date=1293525108]

Its alright, at least your trying to learn and blender isn’t the easiest thing to get use to. But really I can already tell its to much poly. But overall I guess 3/5.
[/quote]Wat’s Poly and do you know how to Free Draw on Blender?

Poly is just another word for faces. “Whats your total poly” is just the same as “Whats your face count”.

Uh Oh…

Dunno how to do that lawl? i mean like finding the face count[/quote]
Since I don’t know how to do that in Blender. I’ll tell you a way to check, until someone corrects this with a legit way.

Export your model as a 3DS, and then open the model in Meta. In meta, go to View > Document Information.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Item [Blender] [100% by me]
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:375341”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=471297.msg3447050#msg3447050 date=1293501290]
Not sure. I’m not able to run installers on my comp, so after I uninstalled blender I haven’t been able to try it out again.
[/quote]
You do know blender has a zipped download right? For a non-install package.

@Topic - Generally I would put down a bit for this, but in the fact I cannot stand blender (issues with the GUI and my eyesight), I will say good job for at least figuring it out. The model, for its intended purpose (if you ment to add this in-game) is perfect, aside from a bit of extra polly that won’t be noticed.[/quote] Can You Give Me FeedBack Please is it good or bad or in the middle

Read full topic

The model, for its intended purpose (if you ment to add this in-game) is perfect, aside from a bit of extra polly that won’t be noticed.
